function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited funds availability for transportation agencies due to COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate maintenance and operation of transportation infrastructure, resulting in safety and health risks for construction workers","Mitigation":"Seek alternative funding sources, prioritize critical maintenance needs, and implement cost-saving measures","Technologies":"Digital monitoring and maintenance systems, cost-effective construction technologies","People":"Transportation agencies, construction workers","Owner":"Transportation agencies, government"}]}
